body:
The first in a series (I guess that means at least two) of
technical notes on Radiance is available for download here:


http://www.iesd.dmu.ac.uk/~jm


This inaugural note has the snappy title: Irradiance Interpolation
Artefacts Caused By Reflections From Glass-Walled Light-Wells


May be useful for anyone using Radiance to predict illuminance
in glass-walled atria etc.


-John Mardaljevic
___
